channel.title: Physically lost my license
channel.description:
Technically, I didn't lose my license, but I left in a place that I don't have access to until the morning, and I hope it will still be in that area when and if I safely arrive to that area then. I was wondering what are some consequences I might be facing if I get pulled over? I'm going to be extra cautious and make sure I'm not breaking any traffic laws. My main worry is going through a license check.
Any tips?

item.title: Physically lost my license
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

I doubt you will get pulled over.

Read full topic

item.title: Physically lost my license
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

[quote=“SilentCJ, post:5, topic:519812”]What country are you in? Would be helpful.

Here in the UK I doubt it matters, I drive around all the time without my license on my person. I imagine the whole thing’s all centralised now anyway, so they can just search reg or name etc and it’ll all pop up.[/quote]
United States. The only reason I’m scared is because my state just recently issued something new that requires a certain amount of license checks in every county.

Read full topic

item.title: Physically lost my license
item.dc:creator: @SilentCJ SilentCJ
item.description:
@SilentCJ wrote:

What country are you in? Would be helpful.

Here in the UK I doubt it matters, I drive around all the time without my license on my person. I imagine the whole thing’s all centralised now anyway, so they can just search reg or name etc and it’ll all pop up.

Read full topic

item.title: Physically lost my license
item.dc:creator: @Tutorial Tutorial
item.description:
@Tutorial wrote:

amy_webb:

Usually it happens if you act differently to how you normally would, just be calm and collected. If you’re pulled over just explain to them that you have left it at the place and you are going to collect it, tell them that you will go down to the station after you’ve collected it and show them.

Alright, thank you so much!

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @amy_webb1 amy_webb
item.description:
@amy_webb1 wrote:

Usually it happens if you act differently to how you normally would, just be calm and collected. If you’re pulled over just explain to them that you have left it at the place and you are going to collect it, tell them that you will go down to the station after you’ve collected it and show them.

Read full topic

item.title: Physically lost my license
item.dc:creator: @krackkid Krackkid
item.description:
@krackkid wrote:

Protip: Don’t get pulled over.

and if you get pulled over, some cops will just let you off with a warning if its a first offence. Just try to explain what happened to the officer, and hope for the best.

But if that doesn’t work, slam your door into the cops crotch and drive off laughing!

Read full topic
